charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 135 months; 120 months on count one, 135 months on count two; counts one and two to run concurrently; S/A fee $100.00 due immediately; (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE DRUGS (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 135 months; 120 months on count one, 135 months on count two; counts one and two to run concurrently; S/A fee $100.00 due immediately; (2)
